kb3.name: kb3_dgmattributetypes
kb3.structure: CREATE TABLE `kb3_dgmattributetypes` ( `attributeID` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `attributeName` char(100) NOT NULL, `icon` char(12) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `defaultValue` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `published` enum('true','false') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'true', `displayName` char(100) NOT NULL, `unitID` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `stackable` enum('true','false') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'true', `highIsGood` enum('true','false') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'true', PRIMARY KEY (`attributeID`), KEY `attributeName` (`attributeName`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
